Name: ShaktiRathore1982
Title: To attend a seminar
Review: It has a great auditorium where seminars and plays are held regularly. The experience in the auditorium is great when you hear a speaker speaks and audience claps.

Name: arun sharma
Title: Enjoyed cultural program
Review: Birla auditorium is a place in Jaipur where one can enjoy cultural events. Today we have enjoyed event organised by Busker

Name: rjpriyanka
Title: Audi
Review: This auditorium is located at statue circle and part of birla instutute of research. A nice audi with good facilities.

Name: Umang A
Title: Nice
Review: This is part of Birla institute of science research and located at statue circle. It has an nice park, Audi and planetarium.

Name: Rajeev M
Title: Okay to Visit
Review: Had a program in the auditorium. The external area is good. The lawns are nice to walk on. Very clean and tidy.

Name: Pierre M
Title: Interesting for Family
Review: The auditorium is a must do for all pupils, or adult wishing to know more about our solar system .The movie takes place in a “space observatory” room . It explains the history of March . I also learned that India launched a rocket, that successfully landed on the red planet .

Name: AKParsurampuria
Title: Not that good
Review: The video quality was poor. Even the 3D animations of solar system and rocket launches weren't upto the mark. The audio content was kiddish. Didn't like it at all.

Name: SameekshakSACHIN
Title: Sameeksha By Sachin - Nice Planetarium, Beautiful Campus
Review: I visited the Birla Planetarium with my family. It is the part of the Birla Institute of Scientic Research, situated at statue circle. Parking is available in the campus on chargeable basis. There is a cafeteria also in the campus. There are different show time for hindi  and english shows. show timings are displayed on their website also. Duration of the show is 45 minutes. Planetarium is closed on Monday. Show was really good and informative. It is a nice place to be there specially for children. Recommended to visit.

Name: Sweta P
Title: Great one
Review: The Auditorium is really nice, curved one and everything is in arranged order to avoid mess up or traffic, nice one.

Name: devs224
Title: Very nice story
Review: Very nice story I have seen at BM birla auditorium.It's looks like a universe in a round shape hall.Like it

Name: Saurabh G
Title: Thousands of delegates yet no crowd!!
Review: Its a great place to hold conventions in Jaipur. Though of late has been supplanted by a new convention centre in the outskirts of the city still the central location of the place makes it ideal to hold the conferences without any hassles. There are 5 halls of variable sizes and enough space both inside and outside to have exhibitions too. Best part is the location. Right at the statue circle, means no dearth of public transport and one is close to all that is famous here.

Name: Amit P
Title: A good experience
Review: I was there with my colleagues for a vacation.. It was quite fascinating and different experience to be there. You will love the interior carving and structure. The best way to enjoy is to take a look Dslr with you or at least a digital camera.

Name: Dinesh_cbe
Title: Good Venue!!!
Review: We were here to take a look of this well-heard auditorium. The entrance was an impression of Ganesh Pol Gateway in Amber Fort. Huge one and good for different events.

Name: Paridhi7392
Title: Auditorium
Review: B M Birla Auditorium is nice construct Auditorium of Jaipur. This Auditorium is one of the best Auditorium in Jaipur.

Name: sid_ups
Title: Biggest Auditorium
Review: Best auditorium in the city. Situated on the statue circle. Design of entry gate is as same as Ganesh Pole of Amber Fort. All the major functions like conference, seminars in the city used to organize here.

Name: SagnikIndian
Title: Excellent Venue
Review: Our national conference was organised here, It is of international standard and all our delegates were extremely happy. It is one of the best conference destination in India.

Name: Verchasv
Title: Seminars & exhibition
Review: The BM birla audotoriam is the nearst of statue circle, the BM birla is in the boundary of Central park, in the season of winter many exhibition are display there. And also meetings, seminars & programme are organised there.

Name: kjchakra
Title: Knowledgeble!!!
Review: We went  there with my 5 yr son in last Jan17. There is so many thing which inspair my son. Specially Rockets. Contribution of ISSRO's marse expedition was outstanding. Daily  shows going on. A small eat out counter also there.

Name: Bharat K
Title: Beautiful Auditorium and Architecture
Review: Well laid out seating with ample leg room and comfortable seating. Offers a grand view of the stage from any seat, even the Balcony seats.Some of the best performances showcased in Jaipur are held here.Very often used for various Exhibitions because of the openness and ample car parking facilities. Moreover it is located at Statue Circle which is the most posh, central & prime location in Jaipur.

Name: Paridhi7392
Title: good
Review: Birla Auditorium is Very famous Auditorium in jaipur. its construction is very attractive.This Auditorium in is very popular in tourist.

Name: Dr Pragati S
Title: Dr.Pragati Sinha
Review: I had the opportunity to visit BM Birla Auditorium this January when our Annual National Conference of the Indian Radiological & Imaging Association was held.I must say,it is one of the finest Auditoriums I have ever visited.It is centrally located with ample parking space for the vehicles to be parked.Halls & lecture theatres are of excellent quality with great upkeep.The seating arrangements are excellent with comfortable chairs.Washrooms were clean & well maintained.I shall be happy to visit the place again,should there be an opportunity.It is definitely pride of Jaipur.

Name: drn85
Title: Birla auditorium... Nice destination..
Review: Birla auditorium located in the heart of jaipur city and it's easily accessible by online cabs and even auto rickshaws. It's a big auditorium located along with the planetarium. The construction was so good with many great views which give a royal look for Rajasthan and we can have photos there. The planetarium is very good and informative for the kids and adults. Daily 4 shows are available and a entrance fee is there. Altogether it's a great option for the travellers in Rajasthan

Name: Gurpreet S
Title: Good business conference venue!
Review: I visited this place on a business conference. The auditorium is very well used for most conferences in Jaipur. It is a decent location to accommodate 3-4k ppl. The open areas are kept nice and clean and I enjoyed my visit here.

Name: jitendra g
Title: Best Auditorium in jaipur
Review: It is known for it's big space with great views. you will love this place after visiting.the galaxy views are great.

Name: 400abhi
Title: Best auditorium in jaipur
Review: BM Birla is one of the best auditorium in jaipur and every big event of jaipur is organised here only , big auditorium very clean and located at a very good place

Name: MKBhatnagar
Title: The only well known Auditorium - Birla
Review: The place is at central location which give different kind of feeling due to giant shape. Its one of the prominent tourist attraction of Jaipur . Heritage feel of the huge auditorium with excellent curatives and comfortable seating. There are wide aisles, well maintained washrooms, and comfortable stairs. There are shows organised with in that for Mars Mission and Space at certain time interval on paid ticket basis but worth seeing. You will find less crowd  in the morning show. Nice insight into the MARS mission and other details of our Galaxy. There is much up gradation of information regarding space and the planet. There is a park with food court with proper parking. It has worth seeing once.

Name: 75jayaraman
Title: Amazing place for space
Review: Less crowd show is the morning show. Nice insight into the MARS mission and other details of our Galaxy. This can be more upgraded with latest advancement in space

Name: Prashant S
Title: Beautiful building, well designed auditorium
Review: Excellent central location. I had a conference here and loved the heritage feel of the huge auditorium with excellent acoustics and comfortable seating (although a bit creaky). There are wide aisles, well maintained washrooms, and comfortable stairs. I am not sure if the auditorium itself is a tourist attraction... I mean, its a pretty building and all, but if you don't have an event here I am not sure if you can enter...

Name: ajit309
Title: good for nothing
Review: They are trying to show what they believe to be true. But this is not a very creditable thing to do at first place. I find entire science to be hoax. This place is good for those who want to put faith in scientist of modern era.

Name: Luckyboy2u
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: Birla Auditorium is nice place to visit with family. Most beautiful thing  there is Tara Mandal. Journey of India in space and Mars mission showing by a beautiful 40 min.  Movie. There is a big park nearby..And also there is something beautiful things.

Name: Dhanpatraj D
Title: Great place
Review: Excellent place for events or exhibition. Good surrounding lawns and excellent environment. Plenty of parking space

Name: pghadamli
Title: THE BEST AUDITORIUM
Review: here is unique in jaipur and when i arrived there it was very amazing with many seating chair & high quality of sound proof system.that was for me surprise.its decoration was very very good and this conference hall is very convenient.

Name: rsaxena67
Title: CHINTAN PLACE WITH HERITAGE LOOK
Review: Birla auditorium is a place for Seminars , Theatre and other cultural performances with a seating capacity of 2500 around .fully airconditioned and well maintained auditorium with good sound proof system . Many medical conferences and cultural events are held throughout the year . Good number of parking for cars and 2 wheelers . One can really enjoy coming and watching an event here

Name: JJB2006
Title: Old as gold
Review: The ethnic auditorium experience. Very amicably built & nicely maintained just like a monument.  The big & specious from both inside & outside. an ideal place for any kind of large scale gathering.

Name: joshisandeep
Title: Good to go
Review: This is the place where we can enjoy planet on earth "Birla Planetarium" . This place can be enjoyed with kids.

Name: vivinabraham
Title: large auditorium jaipur
Review: This is definitely one of the largest auditoriums in jaipur. It is centrally located.It is mainly used as a conference venue.

Name: Raju-Rastogi
Title: “Magnificient”
Review: If you're in Jaipur, then you must visit this place.Its really huge and magnificent Really makes you wonder about the talent and the artistry that people of those times used to have.

Name: agrodent79
Title: Planetorium
Review: We went to see birla museum followed by planetorium. But the museum is closed many years back and there are no shows in English at the planetorium (as otherwise stated to be at 6.00 in evening, at their website). The experience was OK to spend an hour. You can skip this place if any other things are in your list.

Name: abhimanyushah
Title: Good auditorium
Review: Hosts numerous shows every week, it is one of Jaipur's largest auditoriums, right in the centre of the city.

Name: Kalpit0302
Title: Auditorium for Conferences
Review: This is not a tourist place. It is used for conferences, shows etc like any other auditorium. But the campus has a planetarium which is really good place ot visit, specially for kids.

Name: prabhakar1964
Title: a must visit place
Review: a must visit place with kids very knowledgeable. a learning experience even for the parents. shows both in hindi and english available. should have some discount for student.

Name: Kjs
Title: Spacious and Comfortable Seating
Review: Attended many concerts, lecture and inaugural events. Perfect ambience for any show. Its spacious and seats are comfortable. The wash rooms are also clean.

Name: Rahul P Singh
Title: INTRESTING JOURNEY OF GALAXY & STARS
Review: Birla Auditorium “B.M. Birla science & technology center” located in the heart of PinkCity, near the famous landmark Statue Circle. The Birla Planetarium was formally inaugurated by the first Prime Minister of India, Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru on 2nd July 1963. Prior to that, Birla planetarium was functioning only as an educational, scientific and research body. The planetarium, spread across 9.8 acres of land, houses a science museum, information processing and dissemination cell, auditorium, research centers and a planetarium. Everyday planetarium offers a special audio-visual show on the scientific researches and celestial bodies, which attracts number of students.Birla Planetarium welcomes everyone to the lesser known world of galaxy and stars. It introduces the mother earth in such a fascinating method, which leaves one awestruck at the beauty and depth of the universe. A whole new universe can be explored by simply sitting inside a round dome inside the planetarium, where projectors with audio visuals give you a deep insight into each and every functioning of the planets and the solar system. Anyone can visit the planetarium between 1200 hours to 1900 hours and experience the world of stars.There is an astronomical observatory which has the provision for Celestron C-14 telescope, including its accessories like the ST6 CCD camera, solar filters etc. An automation system was established after two years of rigorous work in the year 1993 in order to carry out special effects for the planetarium shows. Though anyone is welcome here, but students are given a special concession to watch the shows.Show Timings 11.00 a. m. Hindi Show1.00 p.m. Hindi Show3.00 p.m. Hindi Show5.00 p.m. Hindi Show6.00 p.m. English Show7.00 p.m. Hindi Show Science MuseumShow Timings10.00 a. m. to 7.00 p.m..Entry fee INR 40.00

Name: pankhain
Title: 1st space introduction for kids
Review: recently i got a chance to visit birla taramandal inside B M Birla Auditorium. My 4 yr old son enjoyed it a lot as well learnt a lot about space as it was his 1st introduction to space world.

Name: SKulveer
Title: Just a normal auditorium
Review: It is just an average hall, which occassionally hosts outstanding events; and at other times some school annual functions and the like. Most of the time it has one or the other consumer exhibition going on in its allied halls and basements; nothing of note. However, it has a planetarium in its campus which is worth a visit if you are interested in stars; one hour well spent for kids.

Name: Shubhang M
Title: Very intresting way to know space
Review: this is very good place near to statue circle jaipur, very good presentation and gives interesting information of space.

Name: amitvashishtha9000
Title: What a veiw
Review: A best description of the name of perfection and it's a best hotel of our entire trip and upcoming trip to india. Staff were professional and helpful the meals and quality of food were amazing. Location is very good around the city and it was the best quiet for tight sleeper. Highly recommended by us

Name: samaira779
Title: nice place
Review: nice experience in doctor conference , Best loctaed at statue circle  in Jaipur near by pink city & other historical Places

Name: dkapur6
Title: NICE PLACE
Review: I liked the neat and well maintained Birla Mandir. The place where shoes are deposited could be more streamlined. The management can learn something from the arrangements at the Golden Temple, Amritsar.

Name: SumitRoy9930
Title: great place
Review: I have been at Birla Auditorium twice , both times for exhibitions , the exhibitions are here on large scale and captivates good number of crowd

Name: 770timran
Title: Does life exist on mars ?
Review: The last time I went to an auditorium was more than 20 years ago. Really excited to visit along with my kids. Interesting show at 1 pm. Kids liked it. Narration is in Hindi with no subtitles.

Name: Amrita
Title: Back to School experience
Review: We had a two day trip to Jaipur. The first day we completed all the major attractions such as the Nahargarh Fort, Jaigarh Fort, Amber Palace, City Palace etc. As we have completed the major attractions, the second day we decided to visit some of the nearby places, Birla Auditorium being one. Its a very nice place, not highly technical or scientific working models you can find, but lots of information and models ideal for taking kids between the age of 5-10 years you can find here. There was an astronaut suit also kept there. It was a back to school nostalgia for us. There is also a show conducted here which is approximately of 30-45 minutes. The show was about human evolution, but we kind of got bored at the end. But still it was a good experience as you feel like school students again.

Name: Jaipalofficial
Title: Amazing
Review: Nice  Auditorium in Jaipur must visit once . Its really beautiful. I would like to recommended this .

Name: VidhiK2000
Title: Well maintained Auditorium
Review: This is one of the most well maintained auditoriums in Jaipur and is way better than the Ravindra Manch. The seating capacity if good and it is clean also. But sometimes you might find a broken seat or two.

Name: kamakshi2015
Title: Good families with kids
Review: Families with kids must visit this place for the knowledge and learning about the cosmos . Check out timings of the show for different language .we end up listening in pore Hindi - we wanted the Engligh show . A fee is charged .

Name: cgpurohit
Title: Space travel At Jaipur
Review: I have visited many time. its always worth visiting any time you visit Jaipur. India has achieved many things in space science, so knowledge adaptation is v good.

Name: agarwalridhi
Title: best auditorium in town
Review: this is the best auditorium in town.. it has got a good seating capacity.. the stage is very big! and its very neat n tidy!

Name: AR R
Title: Outer space and astronomy.
Review: Outre space views brings one to the nether world. Real experience and knowledge with special sound effects. All youngsters should take advantage of such facility.

Name: ddevarshi
Title: Perhaps still the best centrally located auditorium of the town
Review: This auditorium is located close to Sawai Jai Singh Statue Circle (popularly known as Statue Circle) monument. In the same complex there is a planetarium, exhibition halls, a science museum and a research center (apart from the auditorium). The halls/lawns/auditorium may be hired for scientific/academic/cultural events/exhibitions. I have observed that many reviewers have given their comments on planetarium and museum here though the property for reviews are expected is "auditorium". This is surely one of the best auditoriums of Jaipur. There was a time when govt. owned Ravindra Rang Manch/Ravindra Manch (named after Ravindra Nath Tagore and located in Ram Niwas Bag) was the only auditorium available in the city. Construction of this auditorium widened the choice for organizers. This was much clean and far more equipped then Ravindra Manch so became popular in a short time despite its high rates as compared to the other. It became a status symbol to hold event here. Good sound system, better chairs, enough leg space, clean carpets, soothing lights and ample space around auditorium are the reasons for its popularity. The entrance gate of Auditorium and museum complex itself is an attraction as it is huge and resembles Ganesh Pol of Amber Fort. Many tourists/visitors fondly get themselves photographed on stairs leading to this gate. The Science museum is not good, not at all close to the lesser known Science Museum of Shastri Nagar, Jaipur. It was perhaps built to justify the initial terms and conditions on which Birlas (the famous corporate house of India) got this land. The planetarium, was most modern one of its time as Mr. A.G. Kulkarni who was first Director of the Planetarium has told me. It had automated slide projectors which could project colourful images of clouds and horizon, a feature that was not available in other planetarium then.

Name: kaushal874
Title: Plenty to Learn and have fun
Review: This is a classic establishment, unique in its own kind of way. Seating capacity is more than 1300, which is amazing. I have never seen so much capacity in a single auditorium.The maintenance is good and furnished. The display is really good and worth the fun.

Name: PRIYANK U
Title: Good for kids & education
Review: On of the childhood favorites. We used to go here often as a part of school picnic. Good place to see fascinating stuff about science.

Name: Gurleen08
Title: largest audi with marvelous architecture
Review: one and only theater of india that is a classic mixture of old and contemporary Indian architecture with the fresco highlighting traditional Rajasthani art. The main auditorium with a seating capacity of 1350 people, is one of the largest auditoriums in India, built to international conference standards.

Name: dcb23
Title: Thumbs up!!
Review: A well maintained, large capacity holder, well furnished auditorium adorable for all kinds of functions and events like sangeet, musical concerts, exhibitions, plays. I have visited this place several times on various occasions and have always found it worth the visit.

Name: Suket314
Title: BIRLA AUDI
Review: located at a good connecting place. good parking space , large capacity, mostly full through out the year.... many cultural , traditional , seminars , workshop happens in this audi... it has a large capacity

Name: skagarwal74
Title: Good for kids
Review: Birla Planetarium offers good experience for kids definitely and parents as well.The show is good and the displays around the dome is interesting as well. Its for sure that Children will like it and definitely come out happy.The place is surrounded with gardens and evening is a good time to spend here.

Name: sudhanshuy
Title: Nothing worthwhile
Review: Except for the planetarium in the same compound- this place does not offer anything new. the other saving grace is the photo opportunities the front facade offers.

Name: virendra a
Title: Best place to go with kids
Review: There is birla planetorium here where you can watch a 35 min show which is awesome. after that there is a science building where many science models are kept for kids. there is food available.

Name: agarwalridhi
Title: musical evenings!
Review: the best place for any music concert! recently attended sankalp musical show which was a hit.. the sitting arrangement is excellent

Name: Sayan B
Title: poor maintenance
Review: Location is  very good but the property is not maintained at all. Nice yo organise conferences and get togethers, but staff is very rude.

Name: ChrisJ45
Title: Astronomy Defined
Review: A nice little place if you are a astronomy/space/science fan. A gallery to walk around with exhibits on space missions and Einstein. The visit ticket also includes a 40 minutes show on astronomy over the ages. Kids would like it.

Name: 224juliaandjim
Title: Brilliant !!! So wonderful
Review: Brilliant !!! So wonderful There's nothing much to see at this museum which is at the basement of Birla Mandir except for a miniatures of ship & few more. You could plan it in your itinerary if you are interested to know about Birla's family history.If you are in Jaipur and neven been to such a place. It's worth visiting for a short 30 minute movie.

Name: aryan108
Title: GOOOD...
Review: this place is very good it tells you about the formation of different stars and the connection of them from the egypt about the sun, the egypt culture and all..... this place gives you a traditional feel that is why it is boring .... the young people won't be able to understand it  as it is interesting in the starting and boring towards the end ..... the sound and picture quality is brilliant..

Name: Saksham2014
Title: The world of Space
Review: This place is located on Statue circle which is almost the central location of Jaipur. This is basically a multipurpose place . There is also a Planitorium here which hosts shows round the day in English and Hindi.Also the auditorium hosts many shows round the year. The plantiorium is worth visiting. You must go here with family..

Name: anurag842011
Title: nice big
Review: auditorium is big enough for more than 1000 people with all the facilities and seats are very comfortable for people.

Name: pavangupta
Title: auditorium
Review: Birla Auditorium is an iconic and landmark building, at the must visit statue circle and it's period architecture is so pleasing to the eye with it's perfect and imposing proportions, surrounded by a well manicured and excellently maintained garden frequented by variety of birds

Name: Missbutterscotch
Title: "Perfect Place...... "
Review: it is perfect place for events like any drama shows,annual functions, assembly& official meetings   etc . I attended my school annual function .... it was really nice ..... and the staff was well mannered with every one :)  .... & it is located at the best part .... :D

Name: deejay90210
Title: Great convention center
Review: Nicely located, with great cultural architecture and modern halls. A perfect blend of traditional architecture with modern facilities. The main hall is huge with all the amenities. The central park is also well maintained with flowers and fountains and gives the auditorium a calm atmosphere.

Name: SuhasBd
Title: Excellent
Review: I had been to conference to Jaipur recently. The venue was B M Birla Auditorium. It is an excellent place for conference. The location is very good. The surrounding and entrance are impressive at first sight. The entry arch is typically looks like an entry to the Rajasthani Palace. The lobby is simple, but gracefully decorated with pictures of the icons in every field. The main auditorium is huge and with comfortable chairs. Ours was a medical conference and the speeches were simulteniously conducted in five to six halls. The halls on first and second floors were bit smaller in size. The banquete was conducted on lawns of the venue, which was quite large and well maintained. The auditorium was clean with well functioning airconditioning and comfortable sitting ( and dozing, especially after lunch). I liked this venue very much.

Name: mohibahmed786
Title: Excellent
Review: Yes I say it with emphasis ....."EXCELLENT".......!!!!for convention. Large central auditorium, interiors are well crafted, cleanliness, plush green lawns, designed fountains. .....Other labs and rooms are also good...

Name: prince pulkit
Title: PERFECT PLACE
Review: B M BIRLA Auditorium is very good in heritage building design.ITis properly maintained by the government.The garden view fron inside and outside is very good.Here in this place a lots of events and conferences are going out every day.

Name: RudyLuise
Title: 9th Conference on the Jurassic System
Review: Great organisation and having fine dinners in shelters on the lawn at the end of presentation sessions

Name: Sanjy66
Title: I have been master of ceremony here many a times!!
Review: Hey!folks as you know I am a borned in jaipur at later in post university days I was a complete hit with my oratory and was master of ceremony  for several cultural events.this auditorium is very tastefully done up.the auditorium is well equipped with high class audio system .the stage is a huge success as the depth ,the width is perfect.very busy place in the evenings as every now and then one or the other function takes place over here.you can enjoy the surrounding carvings on the outside walls and the whole place is very beautiful and a positively proud monument of recent decades.

Name: damianbhagat
Title: Best place for children
Review: The presentation of knowledge in this place is beyond comparison. The audio visual aids to present little facts are unseen almost anywhere in the world. Do go there if you have children.

Name: Pinakin81
Title: architectural delight
Review: B M Birla Auditorium is by now an iconic and landmark building, at the must visit statue circle and the entire impressive road from "Paanch Batti" to "Vidhan Bhavan", it's period architecture is so pleasing to the eye with it's perfect and imposing proportions, surrounded by a well manicured and excellently maintained garden frequented by variety of birds, which together immediately uplifts the soul the moment you enter in the complex, housing very large auditorium,museum, planetarium, and other halls with ample parking lots. Not to be avoided if you have an eye for beauty. P D Lalsodagar

Name: AMIT AGARWAL
Title: Must go for children
Review: In a place like India where very few learning options for small children are made, the B M Birla Planetarium is a breath of fresh air. Small children really enjoy learning about the glaxy in a fun way and it is a must watch. Hats of to the Birla's - only they can do such things in India.

Name: dpagrawal24
Title: Wonderful Place
Review: BM Birala auditorium is one of the finest auditoriums of the state, and undoubtedly the best in the Pink City. Its seating facilities, sound system, stage - everything is SUPERB! It is very well maintained and professionally managed.

Name: manash d
Title: wow....
Review: There's nothing much to see at this museum which is at the basement of Birla Mandir except for a miniatures of ship & few more. You could plan it in your itinerary if you are interested to know about Birla's family history.

Name: Gaurav Verma
Title: Skippable
Review: There's nothing much to see at this museum which is at the basement of Birla Mandir except for a miniatures of ship & few more. You could plan it in your itinerary if you are interested to know about Birla's family history.

Name: Omdeepak
Title: There is a Planetarium inside it...
Review: A fun place for those who have some interests in the Sky and Planets. They keep on changing the small movies every month. For adults and children, it's a wonderful experience if you haven't been to a planetarium before.If you are in Jaipur and neven been to such a place. It's worth visiting for a short 30 minute movie.

Name: rohitc3
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: Lovely place and nice architecture. historical monument in jaipur.Lovely place and nice architecture. historical monument in jaipur.Lovely place and nice architecture. historical monument in jaipur.

Name: Manoj Awasthi
Title: Good for confrence
Review: Its very well managed etc in terms of sitting arrangement, sound quality hall for big event like speech and motivational programme

Name: saurkumar
Title: International Audiotorium
Review: even after almost one and half decade this auditorium is giving hard time to any organizing council..because it is most beautiful, the most admired, the most busiest and most appraised auditorium in jaipur... Don't miss your chance to visit it

Name: aroranuj
Title: Planetorium a must for kids
Review: Birla Planetorium is an excellent way to brush up your knowledge of our solar system. I had been to Delhi planetorium long ago in 1987 when Pluto was a planet. We were reminded that now it has lost its exalted position in the celestial sphere. After the show at planetorium you take a round of the auditorium where interesting facts about space and man's bid to conquer it are displayed.

Name: Capt Sudhir Dixit
Title: Land mark itself alongside Statue Circle
Review: Excellent place for shows, exhibitions, sales n conferences. Centrally located and well maintained in traditional Rajasthani design n paintings. Very neat n clean place with easy access from parts of Jaipur.

Name: Maharookh
Title: Astronomy .
Review: A lovely building and a lovely little show  at the planetarium but held only in Hindi - so if you're not excellent at the language, some of the terms and explanations just pass you by.

Name: vivek_kool
Title: nice place
Review: Must see for children.fantastic place to learn about astronomy.they have different shows for english and hindi.Also they organise different shows and seminar's and shows

Name: Mayurpatell
Title: Excellent !!!!!!!!!!
Review: B M Birla Auditorium is good for the knowledge about space. Located between the hart of the Jaipur city. All different language program performed daily. Nice child A/c with vise of space activities and lot of knowledge.

Name: BrandieBee
Title: Don't waste your time
Review: I checked the official website of the planetarium to verify that there was an English showing. The site indicated one English showing, however, when I arrived this was not the case. The price was also different, which is not that surprising from my experience thus far in India. Since I had paid 80 rps for the auto i decided to stay and enjoy the view of the solar system without the benefit of the narration. Unfortunately there was a school group entering at this time and it was myself and 75 very loud and rude children who were all staring at me. I would never recommend anyone to waste their time at this location when there are so many other wonderful ways to spend your time in Jaipur.

Name: Funwithall
Title: fun with family
Review: its a wonderful place , every student should visit this, clean fully air conditioned and very reasonably priced ticket, they will take you to the another world for next half an hour, u will feel the effects created by them documentary is too good, must go if your children are above 10

Name: rachel83
Title: Enjoyed
Review: I went alone a bit boring for toddlers, interesting to see how it all works and was impressed the clock actually gave the correct time! Just do a short visit not worth a long time as more interesting places to see
